title: Big Sky Bachelor
description: JANESSA GREENE IS LEAVING THORNTON SPRINGSAll she's ever wanted is to attend cooking school in Seattle. But when a big-shot rodeo rider comes to work on her family's Montana ranch, Janessa's determined not to let the cowboy distract her from her goalâ€”no matter how charming he is.Micah was a rodeo star, but he's been trampled by one bull too many. While he's deciding his next move, he gets sidetracked by a pretty cowgirl who's headed out of town. Can Micah convince her to take a chance on a cowboy ready to put down roots?
author: Lesley Ann McDaniel
